game.name: Ruins of the Forgotten:  A Wild Survival
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Strategy, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Discover an open-world survival game that divides animals into two factions. While crafting, building, and taming animals, explore the forgotten ruins. Do whatever it takes to last another night and solve the mystery surrounding animal factions.
